service:bcl-commit-hub:1.Name: http-rpc-alive
service:bcl-commit-hub:1.Notes: Checks that Tendermint RPC Server is running
service:bcl-commit-hub:1.Output: Get http://127.0.0.1:46657/status: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:46657: connect: connection refused

service:bcl-commit-hub:2.Name: tcp-p2p-alive
service:bcl-commit-hub:2.Notes: Checks that Tendermint P2P Server is running

service:bcl-commit-hub:3.Name: tm-missed-blocks
service:bcl-commit-hub:3.Notes: Tally for monitoring missed blocks threshold

service:bcl-commit-hub:4.Name: tm-late-block-time
service:bcl-commit-hub:4.Notes: Tally for late block time threshold
service:bcl-commit-hub:4.Output: Last block time is 40s behind current time
